src:
Hasil Lengkap dan Klasemen Pekan ke-11 Serie A 2019/2020
04 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Hasil pertandingan dan klasemen pekan ke-11 Serie A 2019/2020. Juventus mampu meraih kemenangan dengan skor tipis atas Torino dan tetap berada di puncak klasemen sementara Serie A.
Juventus memainkan susunan pemain terbaiknya di laga Derby della Mole. Cristiano Ronaldo tampil sejak menit awal. Namun, Matthijs de Ligt lah yang menjadi bintang lewat gol yang membawa Juventus menang 1-0 atas Torino.
Inter Milan juga meraih hasil bagus di pekan ke-11. Bermain di Stadion Dell'Ara, Inter Milan menang dengan skor 1-2. Dua gol Inter Milan dicetak Romelu Lukaku, salah satunya lewat eksekusi penalti pada menit 90+1.
Sementara itu, hasil buruk kembali diraih AC Milan. Ditantang Lazio, laga digelar di San Siro, Milan justru menelan kekalahan. Milan kalah dengan skor 1-2 lewat gol Ciro Immobille dan Joaquim Correa.
text:
Complete results and Standings for Week 11 of Serie A 2019/2020
Nov 04 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Serie A Week 11 results 2019/2020. Juventus were able to win with a narrow score over Torino and remain at the top of the Serie A standings.
Juventus play their best players in the Derby della Mole match. Cristiano Ronaldo appeared since the early minutes. However, it was Matthijs de Ligt who was the star through the goal that gave Juventus a 1-0 win over Torino.
Inter Milan also achieved good results in Week 11. Playing at the Dell'Ara Stadium, Inter Milan won with a score of 1-2. Two Inter Milan goals were scored by Romelu Lukaku, one of them was through a penalty at 90 + 1 minute.
Meanwhile, a bad result was again achieved by AC Milan. Challenged by Lazio, the match was held at the San Siro, Milan would actually defeat. Milan lost 1-2 on goals by Ciro Immobille and Joaquim Correa.
